initial_state: The user is on the profile settings page with a visible profile picture and an 'Edit' button.
steps: Locate the current profile picture on the page.
Click on the 'Edit' button next to the profile picture.
Select a new picture from the disc using the file dialog that appears.
Confirm the selection of the new picture.
expected_state: The profile picture is updated to the newly selected image. The change is visible on the profile settings page.
